title: Chlorophyte Partisan
summaries: The Chlorophyte Partisan is a Hardmode spear crafted using Chlorophyte Bars. It beats all of the "standard" ore spears, dealing 1 more damage than the second-best of the standard Hardmode ore spears, the Titanium Trident, and dealing equal damage to the Adamantite Glaive, but having a faster use time. When thrust, it emits a cloud of spores from the tip of the spear at the apex of the thrust, which looks exactly the same as the Chlorophyte Saber's projectile. The cloud travels a short distance in the direction the spear was thrust before fading out, penetrates solid blocks, and can damage an unlimited number of enemies. Unlike the Chlorophyte Saber, its spores deal knockback.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 3 GC60 SC
